welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Snellville, a charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. Get ready to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Winder Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
